title: The Data Decoded
text:
Welcome to The Data Decoded — a living gallery of data stories and charts shared on X.
Each visualization includes its R code, chart, and a short description.














Airbnb Demand in the UK (2018–2024)



tourism

uk



Trend in guest nights based on AirDNA data.



Jan 10, 2025

title: Airbnb Demand in the UK (2018–2024)
text:
library(tidyverse) source(“R/theme_data_decoded.R”) theme_set(theme_data_decoded())
airbnb <- read_csv(“data/airbnb_demand_uk_2018_2024.csv”)
ggplot(airbnb, aes(year, demand, group = 1)) + geom_line(linewidth = 1.1, color = “#192951”) + geom_point(size = 2, color = “#192951”) + labs( title = “Airbnb Guest Nights in the UK (2018–2024)”, caption = “Source: AirDNA” )
